content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: Hello Ryanah, nice to meet you. What is your budget for renting the apartment?
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: My budget is 300 Euros per month. I am looking for a studio apartment, preferably with a view. Do you think your apartment fits my needs?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, our apartment is a studio apartment with a beautiful view of the city. It is 25 square meters in size and we are willing to negotiate on the rental price. Based on our current pricing, we are considering renting the apartment for 280 Euros per month. Would that be within your budget?
name: Ryanah Rahman

content:
That would work, thank you. How long is the lease? And is it possible to renew the lease after the initial term?

I also have a question about the utilities. Who pays for the electricity and water bills?

Thank you again for your help. I am looking forward to moving in.

I agree to the price of 280 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Great, we're glad to hear that our apartment fits your needs! The lease term is for one year, with the option to renew for another year. Regarding utilities, the tenant is responsible for paying for electricity and water bills. However, we can provide you with information on how to set up utility accounts and ensure that the bills are paid on time. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask. We're looking forward to having you as our tenant!
name: Ryanah Rahman
